properties.entry: SELECT C.*, M.USER_ID, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.PROD_IMG, B.PRICE, B.STATUS AS BOARD_STATUS FROM CART C JOIN MEMBER M ON (C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN BOARD B ON (C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND C.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PUT_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO CART ( CART_NO, USER_NO, BOARD_NO, STOCK, PUT_DATE, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
UPDATE CART C SET C.STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO IN (SELECT M.USER_NO FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.USER_ID = ?) AND C.BOARD_NO IN (SELECT B.BOARD_NO FROM BOARD B WHERE B.STATUS = 'N')
